name: invalid-dir

patterns.pattern: ^Something seems to be in the way...$
^As you approach, the cobalt flash of an astral barrier warns you back.$
^Sorry, that area is for game administration only.$
^Sorry, you need to be a level-(.+) staff member to go there.$
^All you can do is cling to the shaft and hope for the best!$
^Are you crazy? There's a moving elevator car there!$
^You'll have to drop any vehicles before going there. \(If you can't drop them and are completely stuck, use the STUCK command.\)$
^You're wearing too much armor to move!$
^You can't go there without having the right key or pass in your inventory.$
^Maybe you should get on your feet first?$
^It will be difficult to do that while tethered to the matrix.$

script:
awake.mapper.logDebug("Popping movement dir because movement blocked...")
awake.mapper.popMoveDir()
